name: MyBetterNutrition
0:
”Alexa, Open My Better Nutrition”
”hear today's tip”
”are carbs good for breakfast?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my better nutrition
des:
Hi, I am dietitian Ashley Koff, your guide to better health powered by better nutrition. You and me, we want the same thing – better health – right? Better nutrition is key to better health, so I am thrilled to help you discover deliciously doable better nutrition choices at home or on the go.

Ashley Koff RD presents My Better Nutrition.
Ask to get Daily Tips - Ask A Question - Get A Pep Talk. Skill features product recommendations and delicious recipes.

Don't miss getting my better nutrition tools via web-link straight to your mobile device!

* Awarded the Overall Best Skill Update by VoiceBrew.com 8 Best New Skills 2019 *

Get a FREE quiz for you and your family to see which colors in the better nutrition rainbow you need to focus on to give your body more of what it needs to run better. https://thebetternutritionprogram.com/bnp-programs-for-patients/#rainbow-eval

200 new questions added that cover: 
The Most Frequently Asked Nutrition Questions
Kids, Teen’s & College Student Nutrition 
Cold Prevention & Healing Better 
Better Nutrition for Guys 
Better On The Go Options... even at the gas station
Pep Talks to Stay Motivated

Sample questions to ask My Better Nutrition:
· What is a better potassium supplement?
· Should my kids eat carbs for breakfast?
· How can I help my husband sleep better?
· What can I eat to help my skin look better?
· Which fruits are the best to eat?
· What’s a quick remedy for the flu?
· How do you get calcium if I go vegan?
· What does fasting do for my body?
· What is a better alcohol for weight loss?
· What foods are good on an alkaline diet?
· What breakfast will give me more energy?
· Do you have a healthy kids snack?
· Do you have a plant based kids snack recipe?
· Looking for the best avocado toast recipe
- Do you have a hemp pesto recipe?
· What is ok to drink if I have kidney problems? 

My Better Nutrition aims to help you identify and make your better nutrition choices with hundreds of answers to help you choose better foods, drinks and supplements as well as better nutrition recipes. Our content is updated frequently to provide you with more better nutrition tips!

Disclaimer: The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. Please call your doctor to receive medical advice.

Ashley knows nutrition! 
“Ashley Koff, RD. is a world class expert in nutrition and leader in her field who we invite to the show regularly to share her practical tips, and explains them so the audience remembers and can use her advice" - Dr. Mehmet Oz, The Dr. Oz Show

“ Ashley is an instrumental player in the field of nutrition. I trust she will no doubt transform the industry.” – Andrew Weil, M.D., is a world-renowned leader and pioneer in the field of integrative medicine

“Ashley is the most knowledgeable nutritionist that I have ever worked with. She really cares about her clients.“ - Emily Deschanel, actress and producer of, TV series, Bones

Award-winning nutrition expert Ashley Koff, RD is leading the conversation on better nutrition for healthy living nationwide. Koff helps individuals, practitioners and businesses discover the power of personalized nutrition to get better outcomes. With more than two decades as a top practitioner, media expert, author and speaker, Koff is currently the CEO of The Better Nutrition Program, a company that provides assessment tools to practitioners and their patients. She frequently appears on local and national media outlets including, The Today Show, Dr. Oz Show, The Doctors, Fox & Friends, Entertainment Tonight, Good Morning America as well as print and online publications

Koff is the host of My Better Nutrition, an Alexa skill featuring daily tips, pep talks, and providing answers to popular nutrition questions. 

To learn more about better nutrition tools and programs visit TheBetterNutritionprogram.com.
To learn more about Ashley visit: AshleyKoffRD.com
Support Email: ashley@thebetternutritionprogram.com
